translations: 变位；位移；[地质]断错；[医]脱臼（dislocation 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 刃型位错；边缘位错；刃差排

sentences.sentence: Similar dislocations played out around the world.
sentences.translation: 类似的错乱在全球各地上演。

sentences.sentence: Globalization has brought great opportunities, but also many new stresses and dislocations.
sentences.translation: 全球化带来了许多机遇，同样也带来了诸多压力与混乱。

sentences.sentence: "If these factors are changing, subtle dislocations of bees and flowers seem plausible," said Prof Thomson.
sentences.translation: “如果这些因素发生变化，就有可能在蜜蜂和花之间产生微妙的混乱关系，”汤姆森教授说。
